ai-mnd15:170.4_0: In this case, a learned noble disciple carefully and properly attends to dependent origination itself:
ai-mnd15:170.5_0: ‘When this exists, that is; due to the arising of this, that arises; due to the cessation of choices, that ceases. That is: conditioned phenomenon; due to the cessation of choices.
ai-mnd15:170.6_0: and so there is an origination of this whole mass of suffering.
ai-mnd15:170.7_0: When ignorance fades away and ceases with nothing left over, choices cease. When choices cease, consciousness ceases. When consciousness ceases, name and form cease. When name and form cease, the six sense fields cease. When the six sense fields cease, contact ceases. When contact ceases, feeling ceases. When feeling ceases, craving ceases. When craving ceases, grasping ceases. When grasping ceases, continued existence ceases. When continued existence ceases, rebirth ceases. When rebirth ceases, old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress cease.
ai-mnd15:170.8_0: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.’”
